nodes.text: Worxer, also called Yablon, was a planet in the Degan Gas Clouds of Elrood sector. It was destroyed when its sun went supernova around 198 BBY. The Galactic Republic only managed to evacuate a few of the native Spiners, and by the time of the Galactic Civil War, most people believed the species extinct, a mistake not far from the truth.
Pablo Hidalgo named the Spine homeworld "Yablon" as a nod to Cliff Yablonski, a correspondent on the website somethingawful.com.
